entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kaladar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
